title: Bloomberg Markets: Doraine on Impact of Harvey on Munis
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Doraine on Impact of Harvey on Munis
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Charles Doraine President and Chief Executive Officer Doraine Wealth Management Discussing his eyewitness view of Hurricane Harvey from Corpus Christi, Texas and the impact on municipal bonds.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
